title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses Ben Roethlisberger's final game at Heinz Stadium in Pittsburgh and why the future Hall of Famer could have won a lot more considering his physical talents. He explains why it's officially time for this AFC team to move on from their "franchise QB" and go find a real one. He shares his Herd Hierarchy after week 17 of the NFL season. Plus, Super Bowl champion Brian Billick joins the show to share his memories of coaching against Roethlisberger and if the Seahawks can solve their Russell Wilson-Pete Carroll issue. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
